title: assets
text: Providing the technical solution for monetising real world assets for investment to an ever growing self sustained asset ecosystem.

title: Decentralised
text: Peer to peer technology removes the requirement for middlemen. Enabling cheaper transactions & fully democratic voting systems, whilst removing corruption.

title: Wealth
text: GUT Token is backed by real world assets. Coins are released according to the value of the assets making it deflationary. Wealth is distributed directly between asset owners & investors.

title: Security
text: Using Proof Of Stake Blockchain technology transactions are encrypted ensuring tokens & transactions are secure.
